Header.title: Light Speed Pacing
Header.paragraph: A wireless pacing light system for any course that can be setup in as little as five minutes.

About.paragraph: Our team started in 2014 and offers a simple design maintained by a group of software and electrical engineers with diverse skill sets.

Services.name: Artificial Intelligence
Services.text: By mid 2021, our software will be constantly learning your preferences, recognizing common mistakes, and offering solutions in real time.

Services.name: Blockchain
Services.text: Future support for token-based communication to allow system owners to earn revenue by operating their systems.

Services.name: Cloud Compatibility
Services.text: Race and workout data can be stored securely and analyzed with our cloud-based data platform.

Services.name: Professional Setup
Services.text: While our system can be setup by anyone, we supply dedicated technicians to manage all aspects of the system and support the users.

Services.name: Race Operation
Services.text: We provide technicans that manage times and paces during races and workouts to reduce the burden on coaches and race directors.

Services.name: Mid-Race Adjustment
Services.text: Our technicians will adjust paces mid-race to the specification of the coaches and race directors without skipping a beat.

Testimonials.text: That was so cool to have that pushing me. I don't think I could have run that well without it.
Testimonials.name: Phil V.

Testimonials.text: It helped me to set a PR in the 800, but having David running right behind me didn't hurt either.
Testimonials.name: Jack S.

Testimonials.text: I would've fallen off the pace without knowing if I didn't have the light, so I instead ended up PR-ing!
Testimonials.name: Sarah R.

Features.title: Precision Pacing
Features.text: Accurate pacing for every lap, down to the hundredth of a second.

Features.title: Mobile Control
Features.text: The paces are controlled through a mobile website that can be accessed without needing to install any apps.

Features.title: Wireless Connections
Features.text: This system supports wifi connections for control from the user's mobile phone and is entirely wireless.

Features.title: Battery Powered
Features.text: The batteries include intelligent power management, last all day, and are fully rechargeable.
